org.acra.config

Interface RetryPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRetryPolicy

    public interface RetryPolicy
    A policy which determines if a report should be resent.
    Since:
    4.9.1

      static class  RetryPolicy.FailedSender

    • Method Detail

      • shouldRetrySend

        boolean shouldRetrySend(@NonNull
                        List<ReportSender> senders,
                        @NonNull
                        List<RetryPolicy.FailedSender> failedSenders)
        Parameters:
        senders - a list of all senders.
        failedSenders - a list of all failed senders with the thrown exceptions.
        Returns:
        if the request should be resent later.
